<!-- ========== STYLES + HERO ========== -->
<style>
  :root{
    --brand:#634360; --brand-100:#f0ddef; --text:#0f172a;
    --radius:16px; --shadow:0 12px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.10);
  }
  .hero{ border-radius:24px; padding:clamp(24px,5vw,56px); margin:8px 0 24px;
    box-shadow:var(--shadow);
    background: radial-gradient(900px 420px at 85% -10%, var(--brand-100), transparent 60%),
                linear-gradient(180deg,#ffffff,#faf7fb 70%,#ffffff); }
  .hero h1{ margin:0 0 .25rem 0; font-weight:700; letter-spacing:.2px; }
  .hero p{ margin:0; color:#4b5563; max-width:75ch; }

  .btn-row{ display:flex; gap:12px; flex-wrap:wrap; margin-top:10px; }
  .btn{ display:inline-block; border-radius:999px; padding:12px 18px;
    background:var(--brand); color:#fff; text-decoration:none; font-weight:600;
    box-shadow:0 10px 20px rgba(99,67,96,.25); }
  .btn--ghost{ background:#fff; color:var(--brand); border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.08); }
  .btn:hover{ filter:brightness(0.97); }

  .grid{ display:grid; gap:20px; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(260px, 1fr)); margin:1.25rem 0 2rem; }
  .card{ background:#fff; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06); border-radius:var(--radius); padding:20px; box-shadow:var(--shadow); }
  .card h3{ margin:.25rem 0 .5rem 0; font-size:1.05rem; }
  .card p{ margin:0; color:#374151; }

  .section{ margin: 18px 0 8px; }
  .section h2{ margin: 0 0 8px; font-size: 1.35rem; }
  .muted{ color:#6b7280; }

  .flow{ margin:1.5rem 0 0; background:#fff; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06); border-radius:16px; box-shadow:var(--shadow); padding:12px; }
  .flow img{ width:100%; height:auto; display:block; border-radius:12px; }

  /* dark mode */
  .quarto-dark .hero, .quarto-dark .card, .quarto-dark .flow{ background:#14161a; border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.06); color:#e7e8ea; }
  .quarto-dark .hero p, .quarto-dark .muted{ color:#c9c9c9; }
  .quarto-dark .btn--ghost{ background:#0f1115; color:#e7e8ea; border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.08); }
</style>

<div class="hero">
  <h1>About PAPAYA</h1>
  <p>PAPAYA (Professional Assistance for Publishing Academics and Your Aspirations), the publishing division of Statoberry LLP, is dedicated to advancing agricultural education and research. we ensure every book meets rigorous quality standards set by subject matter specialists. our mission is barrier-free access: by offering open-access versions online, we empower researchers, educators, and students worldwide. our platforms are widely used by agricultural researchers for data analysis, and we actively promote books through our channels to reach a global audience.</p>
  <div class="btn-row">

    <a class="btn btn--ghost" href="#why-publish">why publish with us</a>
    <a class="btn" href="#submit-proposal">Submit Proposal</a>
  </div>
</div>
